alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Fayette; Highland; Warren (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 6:57AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF EAST CENTRAL WARREN, SOUTHWESTERN FAYETTE, CLINTON AND NORTHWESTERN HIGHLAND COUNTIES THROUGH 730 AM EDT... At 657 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Ogden, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Wilmington, Blanchester, Sabina, Lynchburg, Leesburg, New Vienna, Clarksville, Harveysburg, Martinsville, Midland, Highland, Melvin, Samantha, Oakland, Lees Creek, Caesar Creek State Park, Morrisville, Ogden, Kingman and Cowan Lake State Park. This includes I-71 in Ohio between mile markers 38 and 48. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
